hero.tittle2: We collaborate with organizations to build innovative technology solutions that drive results

about.main: We are an IT Consultancy, Equipment supplier and Software developer based in the Moscow, Russia. Our company operates in B2G and B2B markets since 2017 and has more than 200 successfully realized projects. We tailor our solutions to meet your unique needs, goals and expectations

contacts.main: Get in touch with us to discuss your business needs

chooseus.reliability2: We supply hardware and develop software that meets the best quality standards
chooseus.service2: We have solutions that are exactly the right fit for your business.
chooseus.flex2: Getting workable solutions to impossible problems
chooseus.support2: We support the entire project, from requesting to commissioning the solution
chooseus.team2: Our team consists of over 50 highly qualified specialists

teamnew.main: All our employees have experience of working on both large-scale socially significant projects and non-traditional requests. We have been involved in projects from software development for federal agencies of the Russian Federation to the equipment of the mobile planetarium at the children's technology park 'Quantorium'

services.it2: Computers, software, hardware and other IT related supplies and peripherals
services.lab2: Science Equipment and Supplies for Homeschool, Classroom and Laboratories
services.stage2: Pro Lighting, Stage Equipment and Sound Systems
services.soft2: Our experts specialize in custom software development for B2B and B2G markets
services.consult2: From designing and developing technology to implementing and managing systems or processes
